name: The visualization of power
description:
BAproject

This BA-project is an support for my Thesis "Wie wird Kraft in Videospielen vermittelt?" and the goal is to show how power can be visualiced.

Made by:

Paul Grimm

Supervised by Prof. Florian Berger and Prof. Hans Baltzer

Made in: Wintersemester 19/20 7th Semester: project for Bachelor of Arts

>Copyright (c) 2018 by Florian Berger florian.berger@ue-germany.de, Hans Baltzer hans.baltzer@ue-germany.de<

Required Software

Windows, Unity

Getting Started

Download the Repository and start Unity scenes.
